archimate:BusinessProcess.name: ACQ.13.BP10 Establish payment requirements
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish requirements for the release of payments. NOTE 4: This may include for example the decision to link the major proportion of the supplierâ€™s payment to successful completion of the acceptance test, the definition of supplier performance criteria and ways to measure, test and link them to the payment schedule or the decision that payments be made on agreed results.
